import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import React, { useState } from 'react' const Booking = () => { const { bookData, setBookData } = useState({id_peminjam:null, id_alat:null, tgl_pinjam:null, tgl_kembali:null, }) const { state } = useLocation(); const { namaAlat, idAlat } = state; setBookData({...bookData, id_alat:idAlat}); const Booking = ()=>{ console.log(bookData); } return ( //

{setBookData({...bookData, tgl_pinjam:e.target.value});}}/>
{setBookData({...bookData, tgl_kembali:e.target.value});}}/>

) } export default Booking
